g++   -Wall -fPIC -fstrict-aliasing -ffast-math -msse4.2 -DNDEBUG -g -O2   CMakeFiles/embree.dir/embree.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/scene.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/glutdisplay.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/regression.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/embreedevice.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/lexers/stringstream.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/lexers/tokenstream.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/importers/obj.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/importers/assimp_import.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/importers/xml.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/importers/xml_parser.o CMakeFiles/embree.dir/importers/radiance_import.o  -o ../embree -rdynamic ../libsys.a ../libimage.a ../librenderer.a -lassimp -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext /usr/local/lib/libglut.so -lXmu -lXi ../libimage.a -lHalf -lIex -lImath -lIlmImf -lIlmThread /usr/local/lib/libMagick++.so /usr/local/lib/libMagickCore.so ../librtcore.a ../libsys.a -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
